mean_cn: n. 分隔间，火车车厢的分隔间
mean_en: an enclosed space or area that is usually part of something larger and is often used to hold a specific thing
word_etyma: compart分开+ ment 表示行为、行为的过程或结果  → 共同空间被分隔开→ n. (火车车厢中的)隔间;分隔的空间
sentence: Your bed is in the compartment on the right.
sentence_trans: 你的床在右侧的隔间里。
